entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -39.1°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
